tool_description: Monitors and evaluates classification performance across different product categories, identifying problematic categories and performance trends.

model_id.description: Identifier of the classification model to monitor

evaluation_period_days.description: Number of days to include in performance analysis (1-365)

minimum_samples.description: Minimum number of samples required per category for analysis (10-1000)

performance_threshold.description: Performance threshold below which categories are flagged (0.1-0.9)

error_messages: Invalid model ID: The specified model does not exist or is not accessible
Invalid evaluation period: Period must be between 1 and 365 days
Invalid minimum samples: Value must be between 10 and 1000
Invalid performance threshold: Value must be between 0.1 and 0.9
Insufficient data: Not enough classification results available for analysis
usage: Provide model_id and optionally configure analysis parameters. The tool returns detailed performance metrics and identifies categories needing attention.

overall_accuracy.description: Overall model accuracy across all categories

categories_analyzed.description: Number of categories included in analysis

underperforming_categories.description: Number of categories below performance threshold

performance_trend.description: Overall performance trend: improving, stable, or declining
